website_summaries.verdict: Sturdy build, practical features, and seamless appearance put this American Standard model at the top of the pack.
pros: Boasts a feature set that customers appreciate, including a soft-close lid, appealing elongated design, stable hinge system, and anti-microbial finish
Lift-off function allows you to remove it for simple cleaning
cons: This toilet seat comes at a higher price than many, but if you want a premium model you probably won't mind

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit in two places
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a less expensive one I bought 5 months ago. Both my wife and I were getting sciatic pains and isolated them to when we replaced our seats. These seats are 1/2 inch wider and it seems to make a big difference. The soft closing seat and top take some getting used to and to remember when you are in a place without the soft closure not to drop the top --Very nice looking on both the Kohler and American Standard. Colors match well for beige and white, at least as well as can be expected for a toilet.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Toilet Bowl Seat
customer_reviews.text: I find many toilet bowl seats to be cheap these days. This one is not. Fits the oblong bowl perfectly. Opens, closes and lines up perfectly. Would definitely purchase again. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: NJFamily

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install and to Clean
customer_reviews.text: This is as advertised. The ease of cleaning is better than others we have had in previous homes. They are durable and a breeze to get under or take off for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Terry

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive for what you are getting.
customer_reviews.text: This is a $70. plus toilet seat but it just feels and looks cheap. However, the ease of removing the seat from the toilet for cleaning is a real plus. This seat would never last in a business rest room. There are much better toilet seats at half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L.

customer_reviews.title: Easiest install ever
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even need any tools. Including taking the old seat off, reading the instructions on how to install the new seat and installation, the total time this took to install was about 7 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick H. Patin

customer_reviews.title: Cutting costs I guess?
customer_reviews.text: I do have to say I love the original one that came with my toilet. (My fault it broke). I also love the mounting system. As others have said, this replacement is thinner, cheaper, lighter than the original that came with my toilet a few years back. The slow closing mechanism is weaker. Time will tell but I don’t have a good feeling.
customer_reviews.author: Clay Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Toilet Seat
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, great look, easy installation, stays secured, easy removal
customer_reviews.author: steal

customer_reviews.title: Slow to close lid
customer_reviews.text: A great place to sit and the lid closes slow enough that I don't hit on the back of me head. A great pain saver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but really nice
customer_reviews.text: For me this is perfect. I just don’t understand why so expensive. Still I knew this when I bought it so I’m giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: NJ CD

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: ...it's been just a couple of months and still working. We bought it for the hinge, since the original hinges broke; with appliances and fixtures, it's how they last over time. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: techiemom

customer_reviews.title: Overall good seat replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Good replacement toilet seat. Engineering of installation could be better.
customer_reviews.author: uwfoto

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Was not like it was described in ad and picture? Just a cheap plastic piece, paid top dollar for it, was disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: smokinjoe

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived damaged with loose and missing parts. I will ask for a replacement instead of a refund because it looks like a nice product. Hope the next one arrives in better condition and with all the parts.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Hard to close. Not much bigger or nicer than any average toilet seat. Definitely not any more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Installed from the top no bending under the toilet.
customer_reviews.text: The seat came with great instructions and was easy to install. The installation actually can be done completely from the to with no bending over. It closes as advertised and feels sturdy and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: John from ALBANY NY

customer_reviews.title: Life is too short to tolerate dysfunctional toilet seats
customer_reviews.text: Do yourself a favor and stop cheaping out on your toilet seat. No one who visits your bathroom wants to slip. While this is a bit pricey, it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LH Designs

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, perfect fit “both ways” 👍 toilet and user
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Best lid ever!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. Very comfortable. Study and closes quietly
customer_reviews.author: Troski Murphy

product_meta.title: American Standard 5020A65G.020 Traditional EL Luxury Seat WHT, White
product_meta.description: Color:WhiteExperience the look and feel of luxury with the asb toilet seats through coordinating product designs, a durable push button style lift off feature that simplifies the cleaning experience, slow close seat and lid to prevent the seat from slamming, a newly designed stabilization hinge to restrain the seat from shifting, everclean antimicrobial surface to inhibit the growth of mold and mildew and a robust product weighing up to 5lbs. Add sophistication effortlessly to your bathroom by coordinating an american standard brand toilet seat to your next project.
feature_bullets: Slow-close seat and lid for user convenience
Two Button-push removable seat for easier cleaning of the seat & bowl – No tools required
Universal bowl fit with top & bottom mounting hardware included
Durable seats made from polypropylene plastic
Ever-Tite Stabilizing Hinge to prevent the seat from shifting side to side

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars46 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
